basnahira palatha sandaha rupiyal ata koti wisihath laksha panas haya dahasak da wayambaa palatha sandaha rupiyal thunkoti panlaksha haththadedahak madhyama palatha da sandaha rupiyal ata koti nawa laksha hathalis dahak da uthurumada palatha sandaha rupiyal thun koti hathalis laksha wisihath dahak da, uuwa palatha rupiyal hathara kotiyakda, sabaragamuwa palatha sandaha rupiyal ek koti thishaya laksha hathalis ata dahakda nagenahira palatha sandaha rupiyal thun koti anu haya laksha wisihathara dahasak da, dakunu palatha sandaha dekoti panashathara laksha hatadas hayasiya hathalihak da yanadi washayen waya kala bawada amathyawaraya penwa deyi.
